Curator's comments: A Greek Silver Head-Vase D. E. Strong, The British Museum Quarterly Vol. 28, No. 3/4 (Autumn, 1964), pp. 95-102 this fragment does not belong to 1962,1212.1, but was acquired with it.
Acquisition notes: "Bought from Robert Erskine Esq, 7 Cork Street W.1". "Obtained from Egypt and said to be part of the Tell el Maskhata hoard"
